function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Far UV-C lamps can pose a risk to the cornea and skin","Impact":"Potential eye and skin damage if not mitigated","Mitigation":"Use in applications where nobody is present during disinfection","Technologies":"Far UV-C lamps","People":"Building occupants, workers in UVGI field","Owner":"Building managers, UVGI system operators"},{"Description":"Limited research on effectiveness of UV technologies against COVID-19","Impact":"Uncertainty about the effectiveness of UV technologies for COVID-19 disinfection","Mitigation":"Conduct ongoing research to determine effectiveness","Technologies":"UVGI technology for COVID-19 disinfection","People":"Researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Improper placement of UVGI fixtures can put residents at risk","Impact":"Risk of exposure to harmful UVGI radiation","Mitigation":"Proper placement and maintenance of UVGI system","Technologies":"UVGI systems","People":"Building occupants, workers in UVGI field","Owner":"Building managers, UVGI system operators"}]}
